Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with Nio-ScSZ and Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ-based anodes were operated by directly feeding a fuel mixture of CH4, CO2 and N-2 (CH4 to CO2 ratio of 3:2).
Titulo: NiO-ScSZ and Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ-based anodes under internal dry reforming of simulated biogas mixtures

Sentencas: Stable operation under constant current load (200 mA cm(-2)) was achieved with a NiO-ScSZ type anode during 200h operating hours at 900 degrees C. Less stable operation occurred with a Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ type anode.
Titulo: NiO-ScSZ and Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ-based anodes under internal dry reforming of simulated biogas mixtures

Sentencas: In the case of SCFC with Ni0.9Mg0.1O-SCSZ as the anode, the methane reforming activity was higher than that with NiO-ScSZ.
Titulo: NiO-ScSZ and Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ-based anodes under internal dry reforming of simulated biogas mixtures

Sentencas: This was explained by change in the microstructure promoting reforming reactions.
Titulo: NiO-ScSZ and Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ-based anodes under internal dry reforming of simulated biogas mixtures

Sentencas: However, the addition of MgO resulted in degradation of electrochemical performance due to increase in ohmic resistance of the anode material during operation.
Titulo: NiO-ScSZ and Ni0.9Mg0.1O-ScSZ-based anodes under internal dry reforming of simulated biogas mixtures
